properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 1:15AM EST until February 9 at 9:28PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

Tennessee River At Chattanooga at Walnut St. Bridge affecting
Hamilton and Marion Counties

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Tennessee River At Chattanooga at Walnut St. Bridge.
* From this afternoon until Sunday evening.
* At 12:15 AM Friday the stage was 648.1 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 651.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this afternoon and
continue to rise to near 652.1 feet by tomorrow morning. The river
will fall back below flood stage by Sunday afternoon.
* At 653.0 feet...Moderate flooding begins.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
